OOC: Okay this is jer again.

BIC:
Firedrill calms down, then recognizes Prowl as the one who saved 
them. "Thank you very much" he says, with pure intentions in his 
voice, "I thought we were gonners" he then puts out his hand to 
shake, "I'm Firedrill" he says finishing the sentence he couldnt 
start earlier.
